committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to establish the authorized area of Shenandoah National Park.

summary.text: Limits the authorized area of Shenandoah National Park to the 194,000 acres to which fee simple title is vested in the United States as of the date of enactment of this Act. Prohibits any expansion of such park except by an Act of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to establish the authorized area of Shenandoah National Park.
